channel.title: How do I change how high range hits in normal combat
channel.description: I have like no idea how to change the hits, I am trying to make range hit up to 35 in normal combat so it can stand up to melee. At 99 ranged and high bonus it still doesn't hit high :l...Only hits up to 22 or so. I am using hiyascape v1 source by reforced. Anyone know what to do :confused:
